description:
The logging here:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/api.py#L1272-L1273

 LOG.debug("block_device_mapping %s", block_device_mapping,
                  instance_uuid=instance_uuid)

Is useless b/c the block_device_mapping is a BlockDeviceMappingList object which doesn't repr the sub-objects, so you get this in the logs:

2015-11-06 16:45:08.041 DEBUG nova.compute.api [req-47d3eb5f-adf0-4cce-8649-56d56eb938e7 tempest-TestVolumeBootPatternV2-460128209 tempest-TestVolumeBootPatternV2-1003926203] [instance: 01b8916e-97e1-4aa9-95a0-e7278b512a22] block_device_mapping BlockDeviceMappingList(objects=[BlockDeviceMapping(UNKNOWN)]) _create_block_device_mapping /opt/stack/new/nova/nova/compute/api.py:1273
title: bdm logging in nova.compute.api.API._create_block_device_mapping is useless

comments.content:
The logging here:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/api.py#L1272-L1273

 LOG.debug("block_device_mapping %s", block_device_mapping,
                  instance_uuid=instance_uuid)

Is useless b/c the block_device_mapping is a BlockDeviceMappingList object which doesn't repr the sub-objects, so you get this in the logs:

2015-11-06 16:45:08.041 DEBUG nova.compute.api [req-47d3eb5f-adf0-4cce-8649-56d56eb938e7 tempest-TestVolumeBootPatternV2-460128209 tempest-TestVolumeBootPatternV2-1003926203] [instance: 01b8916e-97e1-4aa9-95a0-e7278b512a22] block_device_mapping BlockDeviceMappingList(objects=[BlockDeviceMapping(UNKNOWN)]) _create_block_device_mapping /opt/stack/new/nova/nova/compute/api.py:1273
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/242617
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/242617
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=206b1413e49c2dcf6fcaa1db9b8f877ead18aabc
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 206b1413e49c2dcf6fcaa1db9b8f877ead18aabc
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Nov 6 12:00:18 2015 -0800

    Properly log BlockDeviceMappingList in _create_block_device_mapping
    
    The block_device_mapping list parameter is a BlockDeviceMappingList
    object, and list objects don't repr the sub-objects so it's useless
    information in the logs. Cast to a list to get the sub-objects repr'ed
    in the logs.
    
    The bdm list of dicts from the API request is converted to a
    BlockDeviceMappingList in _check_and_transform_bdm which is called from
    _create_instance before _create_block_device_mapping.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1513934
    
    Change-Id: Id709c0bc9d0ad980d0b36973f3a52034003170af
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
